title: Mammoth Cave National Park: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Media and Public Affairs          News media and persons with print, photography, filming, and and other multimedia inquiries may contact the park's Public Information Officer, Vickie Carson. (270)758-2192 (270)758-9297 fax Click here to email. For general park information, click here.
